text:
Today I’m announcing a challenge to the
Rachel’s English community. It’s the Introducing

Yourself Challenge. I made a video on how
to introduce yourself to Americans. Check
it out if you haven’t already.

>> So, nice to meet you.
>> What’s up, Todd?

My challenge to you is to make a video introducing
yourself. How about we also say where we’re from.

>> Hey, what’s up everybody? My name is
Rachel and I live in Philadelphia.
>> Hey guys, my name is Rachel.

Practice it before you record, and try to
make everything very smooth. Try to link the
words together in one sentence or thought.

Then upload the video to YouTube and send
me the link either by tweeting @Rachels_English

or posting the link to my Facebook page. The
link to my Facebook page is in the description

below. I’ll put them all together and upload
them so you can see everybody else’s.

You’ve watched a lot of videos, now let’s
practice. I’m looking forward to your introduction.

That’s it, and thanks so much for using
Rachel’s English.
